short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Save time by getting instant AI-powered summaries of YouTube videos
short.de: Sparen Sie Zeit mit sofortigen KI-gestützten Zusammenfassungen von YouTube-Videos
short.es: Ahorre tiempo obteniendo resúmenes instantáneos de videos de YouTube impulsados por IA
short.it: Risparmia tempo ottenendo riassunti istantanei dei video di YouTube basati su AI
short.ja: YouTubeビデオのAI駆動の要約をすぐに取得して時間を節約
short.ko: AI 기반 YouTube 동영상 요약으로 시간을 절약하세요
short.ru: Экономьте время с мгновенными AI-обработанными сводками YouTube-видео
short.zh_CN: 通过获取即时AI驱动的YouTube视频摘要来节省时间

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of spending hours watching YouTube videos just to get the main points? With YouTube Time Saver, you can instantly access video transcripts and generate AI-powered summaries, saving you time and boosting productivity!

Features:

Instant Transcripts: Access full transcripts of YouTube videos in one click. Great for note-taking, research, and analyzing content.
AI-Powered Summaries: Get concise summaries using the DeepSeek AI model. Choose your preferred language and get the main ideas of the video without watching the entire thing.
Customizable Language Settings: Select your preferred language for AI-generated responses to make summaries more accessible.
Download & Share: Easily download transcripts and summaries as text files or copy and paste them into your notes or comments.
How It Works:

Open any YouTube video and click on the YouTube Time Saver extension icon.
Instantly access the video’s transcript or generate a quick summary using DeepSeek AI.
Save the transcript or summary as a file, or copy it to share or analyze further.
Why You’ll Love It:

Save Time: Get straight to the main points without watching the whole video.
Boost Productivity: Perfect for researchers, students, and busy professionals who need information quickly.
Easy to Use: Simple interface with one-click access to transcripts and summaries.
YouTube Time Saver is ideal for anyone who wants to make the most out of YouTube without spending hours on videos. Try it today and discover a smarter way to consume content!

Note: You’ll need an API key from DeepSeek to use the AI-powered summary feature. DeepSeek offers affordable options for processing large amounts of text.
